reviewtext: Recently I upgraded my cable internet service from 5 Mbps to 15 Mbps. My cable company recommended that to benefit from the higher speed service I should replace my 4 or 5 year old modem and router with modern ones. I now have a Motorola Surfboard 5120 cable modem and this Linksys router and am pleased with both of them.
summary: Just installed one and am pleased with it
